page.syntax: C Suggest( expr as c, value as c , limit as n = 1 , moreText as c = "", filter as c = "")

argument.name: expr
argument.description: The expression to evaluate to get the suggested values

argument.name: value
argument.description: Returns suggestions that start with value.

argument.name: limit
argument.description: Number of suggestions to return. -1 (default value), indicates that all suggestions should be returned.

argument.name: moreText
argument.description: If limit is not -1, then if there are more suggestions than limit, last suggestion contains the more_text text.

page.description: Suggest a list of possible values given a sample value (to drive auto-complete).
page.example: dim t as p t = table.open("customer") ?t.suggest("lastname","s",5) = Smallwood Smith Smith Smithson
